properties.text: 'Through Space' by maxstack, from Open Game Art, CC BY SA 3.0, "Menu Selection Click" by NenadSimic from Open Game Art, CC BY 3.0, "Rain and Thunder loop" by DoKashiteru from Open Game Art, CC BY 3.0, "Level up sound effects" by Bart Kelsey. Commissioned by Will Corwin for OpenGameArt.org (http://opengameart.org), 'Turning Ship 1' by MillionthVector from millionthVector.blogspot.co.uk, CC BY 4.0
Software used: Construct 2, Adobe Photoshop, GIMP, Github
